name: Hydrapple
description: The Apple Hydra Pokémon. Seven syrpents live inside an apple made of syrup. The syrpent in the center is the commander.

abilities.name: Supersweet Syrup
abilities.description: Attacks made against creatures within 30ft of this Pokémon gain 1d4 on the roll. Creatures with no sense of smell are not affected by this ability.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon regains hit points equal to its level when it returns to its Pokéball.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: Held items cannot be stolen or knocked away from this Pokémon.
